channel.title: Git on WY Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in Git on WY Computer Science

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Tutorials A command line intro to git in 15 minutes. Git for Beginners. Beautiful and simple Git Guide. Local instructions Make an account on GitHub. Use your CPS email. Apply for an education account. Join our class in the GitHub Classroom. (Tell the teacher your username and get added manually.)

item.title: Everyday Git
item.description: Everyday Commands All of these need to be run in the karel-* directory: ./save-it ./update: git pull from the upstream repository. git pull
